akn:content.akn:p:
§ 12164. Regulations Not later than 1 year after July 26, 1990, the Secretary of Transportation shall issue regulations, in an accessible format, necessary for carrying out this subpart. (Pub. L. 101–336, title II, § 244, July 26, 1990, 104 Stat. 352.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective July 26, 1990, see section 246(b) of Pub. L. 101–336, set out as a note under section 12161 of this title.
